content: starwarsrebelbeanie by heather u price this beanie is knit in the round on double pointed needles and only uses three stitches knit purl and k2tog use any two contrasting color yarn you like yarn dk - berroco renew or your dk yarn of start here for following chart or written choice directions mc main color black or dark color yarn with us 2 dpn cast on small 108 cc contrast color red or light color yarn medium/large 128 stitches using long tail gauge 24 st x 32 row = 4 inches in stocking cast-on or your favorite stretchy cast on join to knit stitch knit in the round size medium is shown needles us 2 and us 4 double pointed knit in the round k2 p2 rib for 15 row or to chart legend desired rib length depending if you want the brim shorter longer or folded mine is 15 row knit mc black dark color yarn knit cc red or light color yarn change to us 4 needles and follow the chart or written directions below for medium/large size k2tog knit two stitches together only decrease by two stitches during row 1 of no stitch chart or written directions i do a k2tog once at start of row 1 and once in the middle of the place stitch marker after this stitch round so you have 126 stitches at the end of row 1 note i used ladder back jacquard technique to catch my long floats of more than 5 stitches follow written directions or chart below until 7-14 between the rebel insignias here s a great video stitches remain cut yarn with a ~6 inch tail and tutorial for catching long floats sew the yarn through remaining stitches on your https //youtu be/ucqns-on1nw si=7-iwlc54-3 needles to secure the top weave in the loose udc5gm&t=157 yarn ends on the inside of your hat 1 starwarsrebelbeanie by heather u price written directions row 1 change to larger needles us 4 row 15 k3 mc k1 cc k4 mc k3 cc k4 small size knit in main color mc black mc k1 cc k2 mc repeat to end of round for medium/large size knit in main color row 16 k3 mc k1 cc k3 mc k1 cc k1 mc black and decrease 2 stitches during mc k1 cc k1 mc k1 cc k3 mc k1 cc this first round by k2tog once at the start of k2 mc repeat to end of round the round and again half way around you row 17 k4 mc k1 cc k4 mc k1 cc k4 should have 108 for small 126 for mc k1 cc k3 mc repeat to end of round medium/large stitches at the end of this first row 18 k5 mc k1 cc k2 mc k3 cc k1 round mc k1 cc k4 mc repeat to end of round row 2 knit in contrast color cc red row 19 k9 mc k1 cc k8 mc repeat to row 3 knit mc
